property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({UR} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) {2}{U}: Copy target instant spell you control with mana value 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy. {2}{R}: Copy target sorcery spell you control with mana value 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Diametrically opposing energies in self-sealed plasmodermic bubbles make great pets!" - Trivaz, Izzet mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blazekite is a simple concept, really - just a vehicular application of dragscoop ionics and electropropulsion magnetronics." - Juzba, Izzet tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast it, it deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like many Izzet creations, weirds are based on wild contradictions yet somehow manage to work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shrewd Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. {UR}: Target creature can't block Shrewd Hatchling this turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling. Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast it, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if it's an instant or sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It chews open Mirrodin's husk and feeds on the outpouring of energy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Izzet Chronarch enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({UR} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) Flying Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jund is a wounded world. Beware its searing blood spilling out onto the surface." - Rakka Mar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with mana value 2 or less from your hand. {2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate {1}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But then . . . oh, but . . . which means . . . which would lead to . . . exactly!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Pyromatics deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature. • Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leave the door to the past even slightly ajar and it could be blown off its hinges.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Create a 3/3 blue Weird creature token with defender and flying. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clouds grew thick, and then they grew teeth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This abomination never belonged in our world. I'm merely setting it free." - Dierk, geistmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its host's final curse lies captured within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control. Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Draw X cards. • Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To those in tune with the Firemind, there is no difference between knowledge and flame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{U}{R}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until your next turn, you may cast it if it's an instant or sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Niv-Mizzet's genius and vanity reverberate throughout the mirrored halls of Nivix.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies." - Savra

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, you may mill four cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devouring books is only the beginning. The librarian's next.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}{G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) {2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 life: Putrid Leech gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It reacted to Naya's overabundant food supply by growing additional mouths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Scavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Sacrifice Brain Weevil: Target player discards two cards. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll. Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, you may mill six cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The juiciest prey is that which grows lazy, thinking itself beyond the reach of danger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards two cards. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Victory in the pits is almost as rewarding as the methods I use to achieve it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({BG} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.) Trample At the beginning of your end step, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It eats and eats until the juiciest morsel it can find is itself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercadians not wealthy enough to buy a tomb are thrown into a bog called "the Ghoul's Larder."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When a creature dies, destroy enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The demon's yoke is part leash, part noose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process." - Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. • Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The living cannot understand the benefits of death." - Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After fear and weakness rot away, that which remains is stronger than its living form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing in nature goes to waste, not even the rotting corpse of a good-for-nothing, blood-sucking vampire." - Halana of Ulvenwald

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Twilight's Call as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Twilight falls. We rise. - Necropolis inscription

property.value: Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dakmor Salvage enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, you may mill two cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{B}{G}: Until end of turn, Svogthos, the Restless Tomb becomes a black and green Plant Zombie creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." It's still a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
